definition: weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: What God looks on as obstinate weakness, we call strength.
sentences.chinese: 神看作顽梗的软弱，我们却称之为力量。

sentences.english: For though he was crucified through weakness, yet he liveth by the power of God.
sentences.chinese: 他因软弱被钉在十字架上，却因神的大能，仍然活着。

sentences.english: No matter how steadfast the upper half is , it just can't defeat the weakness of the lower half.
sentences.chinese: 他上半身多么坚贞，也敌不过下半身的软弱。

sentences.english: It clicked off, leaving the room to her soft moans .
sentences.chinese: 它点选过，离开房间，她软弱的呻吟。

sentences.english: The fifth time when she forbore for weakness, and attributed her patience to.
sentences.chinese: 第五次是她容忍了软弱，而把她的忍受称为坚强。

sentences.english: Letting go my strength and weakness, Breathing in Thy life divine.
sentences.chinese: 放弃软弱或是力劲，吸入怜悯和恩湛。

sentences.english: If I must boast, I will boast of the things that show my weakness.
sentences.chinese: 我若必须自夸，就夸那关乎我软弱的事便了。

sentences.english: I think this section's recommendations are weak and non-committal.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这一节的建议比较软弱，没有必要拘泥。
骄傲，激情，和属灵的软弱。

sentences.english: Casablanca was the terminus of a long rickety railway line .
sentences.chinese: 卡莎布兰卡是一长而软弱的铁路线的终点。

sentences.english: Kid's extremely conceited arrogance is for covering up oneself's heart of flabbiness .
sentences.chinese: 孩子狂妄自大是为了掩盖自己内心的软弱。

sentences.english: Ma" s educational thoughts, however, has its limitation-compromise and flabbiness ."
sentences.chinese: 局限性，即妥协性和软弱性。

sentences.english: Severe consequences happen to those who trust in the frailty of people.
sentences.chinese: 那些将信任放在软弱人身上的人，会有严重的下场。

sentences.english: I hate it when guys play weak and let the woman be the tough one.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌男孩子装软弱装无能，而让女孩子唱红脸。

sentences.english: Man calls sin a weakness; God calls it wilfulness.
sentences.chinese: 人将罪视为软弱，在神看却是故意。

definition: small and weak/puny/the small and weak/children/women and children
to be softhearted/to be tenderhearted/to be kindhearted
